word: Confess your sins while you may. Clear the King's highway, that He may use you as His disciples. He will accept everyone who comes to Him. Whoso shall confess and forsake his sins shall find mercy. Even the thief, dying on the cross in awful agony, asked for forgiveness, and it was granted to him. His request to be remembered by the Saviour when He should come into His kingdom was granted. "Verily, verily I say unto thee today, Thou shalt be with Me in Paradise." Not that he would be with Christ in Paradise that same day, for Jesus did not then Himself go to Paradise.
